title: Ceramic art
description: Ceramic art is a form of creative expression that transforms clay into intricate sculptures, vessels, and decorative objects through shaping, firing, and glazing processes

title: Textile Patterns
description: Textile patterns encompass a diverse array of designs that adorn fabrics, weaving together colors, shapes, and motifs into a visually captivating and expressive tapestry.

title: Disti Art
description: Disti Bomma refers to traditional clay or wooden dolls used in the Bommai Golu arrangement during the South Indian festival of Navaratri, showcasing a diverse collection of characters, deities, and daily life representations.
